text: Nyũmba ĩrĩa yangʼetheire nja ya hekarũ mwena wa ithũĩro yarĩ ya wariĩ wa mĩkono mĩrongo mũgwanja.41:12 nĩ ta mita mĩrongo ĩtatũ na ithathatũ na robo (36.25) Naruo rũthingo rwa nyũmba ĩyo rwarĩ na ũtungu wa mĩkono ĩtano gũthiũrũrũkĩria, na ũraihu waruo warĩ wa mĩkono mĩrongo kenda.41:12 nĩ ta mita mĩrongo ĩna na ithathatũ na nuthu (46.5)
